net.minestom.server.extras.selfmodification.MinestomRootClassLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class MinestomRootClassLoader extends HierarchyClassLoader
Class Loader that can modify class bytecode when they are loaded

    • getModifiers

    • findExtensionObjectOwner

      @Nullable public static @Nullable String findExtensionObjectOwner(@NotNull @NotNull Object obj)
      Tries to know which extension created this object, based on the classloader of the object. This can only check that the class of the object has been loaded by an extension. While not perfect, this should detect any callback created via extension code. It is possible this current version of the implementation might struggle with callbacks created through external libraries, but as libraries are loaded separately for each extension, this *should not*(tm) be a problem.
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to get the extension of
      Returns:
      null if no extension has been found, otherwise the extension name
